message.content:
cs.IR, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DS

This paper deals with document similarity, which is a common problem in information retrieval (IR) and natural language processing (NLP). Therefore, cs.IR and cs.CL are the most likely sub-categories. The paper also proposes a new measure of similarity based on semantic analysis, which involves machine learning techniques such as clustering and classification. This makes cs.LG and cs.AI likely sub-categories as well. Finally, the paper uses word placement information to detect similitude, which involves some form of data structure or algorithmic approach, making cs.DS a possible sub-category.
